statements.chinese: 我们喜欢现在做这件事
statements.english: we like to do it now

statements.chinese: 我们不喜欢现在做这件事
statements.english: we don't like to do it now
we like to dance in the street

statements.chinese: 我们喜欢在晚上在街头跳舞
statements.english: we like to dance in the street at night

statements.chinese: 我们不喜欢在晚上在街头跳舞
statements.english: we don't like to dance in the street at night
you like to sleep on the bed

statements.chinese: 你们不喜欢在床上睡觉
statements.english: you don't like to sleep on the bed

statements.chinese: 你们喜欢和我一起跳舞
statements.english: you like to dance with me

statements.chinese: 你们不喜欢和我一起跳舞
statements.english: you don't like to dance with me

statements.chinese: 你们不喜欢在街头和我一起跳舞
statements.english: you don't like to dance with me in the street

statements.chinese: 你们不喜欢在晚上在街头和我一起跳舞
statements.english: you don't like to dance with me in the street at night
they like to talk with me
they don't like to talk with me

statements.chinese: 他们喜欢和你一起跳舞
statements.english: they like to dance with you

statements.chinese: 他们不喜欢和你一起跳舞
statements.english: they don't like to dance with you

statements.chinese: 我们只是想要知道是否他们喜欢在晚上和你一起在街头跳舞
statements.english: we just want to know if they like to dance with you in the street at night
we want to know the answer

statements.chinese: 我们想要知道问题的答案
statements.english: we want to know the answer to the question

statements.chinese: 我们不想知道问题的答案
statements.english: we don't want to know the answer to the question

statements.chinese: 我们想要尽快知道问题的答案
statements.english: we want to know the answer to the question as soon as possible

statements.chinese: 我们想要在公园里散步
statements.english: we want to walk in the park

statements.chinese: 我们想要每天在公园里散步
statements.english: we want to walk in the park every day

statements.chinese: 吃来自这个餐厅的食物
statements.english: to eat the food from the restaurant

statements.english: we want to eat the food from the restaurant

statements.chinese: 我们不想吃来自这个餐厅的食物
statements.english: we don't want to eat the food from the restaurant

statements.chinese: 我们想要在这个餐厅工作
statements.english: we want to work at the restaurant

statements.chinese: 我们不想在这个餐厅工作
statements.english: we don't want to work at the restaurant

statements.chinese: 你们想要在这个餐厅工作
statements.english: you want to work at the restaurant

statements.english: you don't want to work at the restaurant

statements.english: they don't want to work at the restaurant

statements.english: they want to work with you

statements.english: they don't want to work with you

statements.english: I think they want to work with you

statements.english: I don't think they want to work with you
we need to answer the questions

statements.chinese: 我们需要回答关于工作的问题
statements.english: we need to answer the questions about the work

statements.english: we don't need to answer the questions about the work

statements.english: you need to answer the questions about the work

statements.chinese: 你们需要尽快回答关于工作的问题
statements.english: you need to answer the questions about the work as soon as possible

statements.english: you need to answer the questions about the work as soon as possible because they are very important
we don't have to leave now

statements.english: to eat the food from the restaurant
